thread.title: 'True Size Map' Proves You've Been Picturing The Planet All Wrong
thread.title_full: 'True Size Map' Proves You've Been Picturing The Planet All Wrong

author: Suzy Strutner
title: 'True Size Map' Proves You've Been Picturing The Planet All Wrong
text:
'True Size Map' Proves You've Been Picturing The Planet All Wrong It'll rock your world. Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 09/08/2015 09:19 AM EDT 
Did you know that California is more than four times the size of Portugal? Or that you could fit China, the U.S. and India into the continent of Africa, with room to spare? 
Prepare yourself for a whole new kind of geography lesson. 
Visit TheTrueSize.com to toggle The True Size Map. TheTrueSize.com 
For perhaps an even truer view of your next destination, try visiting through the eyes of a cat:
